amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program by $2.5 million and reduces funding for the Office of Justice Programs, Research, Evaluation, and Statistics by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Research, Evaluation and Statistics (Criminal Justice Statistics and Research) by $4.25 million and to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
